pli-tv-bu-vb-sk53:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk53:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pattanillehakaṁ bhuñjanti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk53:1.5_0: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca pattanillehakaṁ bhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk53:1.11_0: parittake sese ekato saṅkaḍḍhitvā nillehitvā bhuñjati,
